# startListening()

**Instance Method**

Tells the speech recognition engine to begin listening for commands.

## Declaration

```swift
func startListening()
```

## Discussion

When a command is recognized the message [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSpeechRecognizerDelegate/speechRecognizer(_:didRecognizeCommand:)] is sent to the delegate.

## Listening

- **stopListening()**: Tells the speech recognition engine to suspend listening for commands.

items.description: Tells the speech recognition engine to suspend listening for commands.
